title: innum En murugA irakkam
sahitya:
innum En murugA irakkam uravillai innal uru mEzhai enniDam nI


anupallavi

  unnaiyanri vEru oruvaraiyum iduvarai uru tuNai enru nAn karudi varavillaiyE


caraNam    cenni malait-talam tannilE sirappuDan vanna mayil vITru viNNavar pOTravE
panniru kaNNAlum bhaktaraip-parivuDan pArttavar tuyarai tIrttu varum duraiyE
